name: downline
description: A cross-platform video and audio downloader for YouTube, Vimeo, Dailymotion, SoundCloud and many other sites

scripts.build:all: npm run build:win & npm run build:linux & npm run build:mac & wait
scripts.postbuild:win:
cd "./dist/win" && mv *.exe ../../releases/downline-setup-windows.exe && 7z a -mx=9 downline-portable-windows.7z win-unpacked && mv downline-portable-windows.7z ../../releases/ && echo "
[BUILD COMPLETE] Windows"
scripts.postbuild:linux:
cd "./dist/linux" && mv *.AppImage ../../releases/downline-appimage-linux.AppImage && tar -cJf downline-portable-linux.tar.xz linux-unpacked && mv downline-portable-linux.tar.xz ../../releases/ && echo "
[BUILD COMPLETE] Linux"
scripts.postbuild:mac:
cd "./dist/mac/mac" && 7z a -mx=9 downline-portable-macos.7z Downline.app && mv downline-portable-macos.7z ../../../releases/ && echo "
[BUILD COMPLETE] Mac"

author: Arjun B <https://github.com/jarbun>
